sentences.en: a golden box containing precious jewels
sentences.cn: 一个装着贵重宝石的金盒子
艾伦，你真是出类拔萃呀。

sentences.en: As the jewel was in the rough state , he had no idea what size it would be when cut.
sentences.cn: 这块宝石未经琢磨, 他不知道加工后有多大.

sentences.en: Doesn't he look like that man who's wanted for the jewel robbery?
sentences.cn: 他不是很像那个因抢劫珠宝而受到通缉的罪犯 吗 ?

sentences.en: He guaranteed the jewel ( to be ) genuine.
He showed me a small jewel on his open hand.
sentences.cn: 他张开手给我看掌上的一颗小宝石.

sentences.en: His achievement is astonishing and this book is the jewel in his crown.
sentences.cn: 他的成就令人震惊，而这部书则是他的杰作。

sentences.en: It is often said of our island that it is like a jewel set in the sea.
sentences.cn: 我们岛常被人们说成是镶嵌在大海上的一块宝石.

sentences.en: Penkovsky was, at the time, the jewel in MI 6's crown.
sentences.cn: 当时, 潘科夫斯基是军情6局皇冠上的宝石.

sentences.en: She loved dressing up and wearing priceless jewels.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢穿上盛装，戴上极为昂贵的珠宝首饰。

sentences.en: The company is also willing to sell 20% of its crown jewel, its credit-card business.
sentences.cn: 该公司还愿意出让其20%的核心业务，即信用卡业务。

sentences.en: The lowest estimate would put the worth of the jewel at ＄200.
sentences.cn: 按最低的评估这块宝石也值200美元.

sentences.en: The police will soon lay their hands on the jewel thieves.
sentences.cn: 警察很快就会寻获偷珠宝的小偷的.

sentences.en: This painting is the jewel of my collection.
sentences.cn: 这是我藏画中最珍贵的一幅.

sentences.en: Walk down Castle Street and admire our little jewel of a cathedral.
sentences.cn: 沿城堡街走下去，欣赏一下我们美妙绝伦的大教堂。

sentences.en: Walk down Castle Street, admire our little jewel of a cathedral, then wonder at the castle.
sentences.cn: 沿着城堡街走下去，欣赏我们视若珍宝的教堂，继而叹服于城堡的壮观。

sentences.en: Your tunic and hose match ill with that jewel, young man.
sentences.cn: 你的外套和裤子跟你那首饰可不相称呢, 年轻人.

words.tran_cn: 珠宝商；宝石匠；钟表匠；钟表商

phrases.tran_cn: 皇冠上的宝石；（镶在王冠、权杖等上面以显示王权的）御宝

trans.tran_cn: 宝石，宝石饰物，受珍视的人[物]，宝贝，手表的宝石轴承
trans.tran_en: a valuable stone, such as a diamond
